text: Yeah, Hey! This place looks beautiful!

name: Caretaker
text: Yes, it does! New Zealand is very beautful, isn't it?
It's hard to notice when we're always at home.

name: Caretaker
text: Yeah! Well, now that you are here as per my request,

name: Caretaker
text: Would you be able to eradicate all 8 pests in the bush?

name: Caretaker
text: Once you have gotten all 9, I'll meet you at the end of the trail!

name: Caretaker
text: I'm feeling a little sick today, so you're a real one
